price: Dájúdájú Allāhu ti ṣe àlàyé òfin ìtánràn ìbúra yín fún yín. Allāhu ni Olùrànlọ́wọ́ yín. Òun sì ni Onímọ̀, Ọlọ́gbọ́n.¹
arabic: قَدۡ فَرَضَ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمۡ تَحِلَّةَ أَيۡمَٰنِكُمۡۚ وَٱللَّهُ مَوۡلَىٰكُمۡۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ
footnotes: 1. Òfin ìtánràn ìbúra wà nínú sūrah al-Mọ̄’idah; 5:89.

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qad faraḍa al-lahu lakum taḥillata aymānikum wal-lahu mawlākum wahuwa al-ʿalīmu al-ḥakīmu
